# Dotfiles

### Install

#### 1. Clone repo

`git clone https://github.com/dev01d/dotfiles.git ~/.dotfiles; cd ~/.dotfiles`

run `./setup.py`

#### 2. Set up Powerline and Airline

#### Fonts

SFMono Nerd font is the current favorite

#### Vim

Neovim bootstraps itself just launch it or `PlugInstall`
